name: Blacksquad - SIZ556XI RUS FIRST RELEASE PACKAGE
detailed_description:
SIZ556XI RUS First Release Package!
Equip yourself with the very first SIZ556XI RUS GL skin series.

[PACKAGE LIST]
SIZ556XI RUS GL CARBON WOOD (permanent)
SIZ556XI RUS GL (permanent)

*SIZ556XI RUS GL CARBON WOOD is exclusive.
*This package is only available until the official release of Black Squad!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: CORE2 DUO 2.2GHZ / AMD Athlon 64 X2 2.66GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE 8600 OR GT630 / RADEON HD 6750
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: CORE2 DUO 2.4CHZ / AMD Phenom X4 820
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 560 / Radeon HD 7790
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
